title: $2,195 Spacious 3br 3ba Lake Arbor Fairways Townhome
map_address: 6740 W. 84th Way, Unit 16 near Arvada, CO 80003
posting_body: ['Welcome to your perfect home!', 'This property will be available August 8, 2022', 'Secluded Townhome, nestled in quiet Lake Arbor Fairways Townhome golf community', '1400 Spacious Square Feet of living space', '3 Level Townhome (2 sets of stairs)', 'this is not a ranch type home', '3 bedroom, one Full Bath, one 3/4 Bath, one 1/2 Bath with large 2 car attached garage, and plenty of extra storage space', 'New carpet throughout', 'All appliances included (with working washer and dryer)', 'Central Air Conditioner and high efficiency Furnace', 'Extra large master bedroom with huge walk in closet and private 3/4 bath', 'End location with lots of windows and lighting', 'Wood burning fireplace', 'Walk out Balcony (perfect for grilling)', 'Recently painted throughout', 'Monthly rental includes paid water, trash removal, snow removal, swimming pool, tennis court, and community garden', 'Excellent location in golf community', 'Lease 12 months', 'Lease rate monthly $2,195.00', '$1,500.00 indemnification deposit (required at lease signing)', 'Two signatures will be required on the Lease agreement.', 'No Pets will be allowed at this property (there is no fenced yard for pets)', 'Adherences to homeowner’s association rules are required and will be strictly enforced', 'Address: 6740 W. 84th Way, Unit #16 Arvada, CO 80003', 'Google location:', '<URL>', 'Neighborhood:', 'Schools shown are schools closest to this address', 'Primary: Little Elementary School', 'Middle: Moore Middle School', 'High: Pomona High School', 'Here is a well kept Townhome in the Lake Arbor Fairways Townhome community.', 'This home has 3 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms.', 'It includes all appliances, has a wood burning fireplace, a deck off the main living room area, swimming pool, tennis court, and community garden.', 'This home also offers an oversized 2 vehicle attached garage with an exceptional workbench area and plenty of storage space.', 'The utility room has washer and dryer hookups and is located on the garage level.', 'This is an end unit adjacent to the community swimming pool.', 'The main living area includes a very spacious living room and dining area, kitchen with all major appliances, and a ½ bathroom.', 'The main living room area has a very nice wood burning fireplace and wood mantle as well as a walk-out deck.', 'The second floor has a full master bedroom with vaulted ceiling, an exceptionally large walk-in closet, and a private ¾ bathroom.', 'There are 2 additional bedrooms which are significantly larger than most town home bedrooms, large closet areas and a full shared bathroom.', 'Please feel free to drive by the unit, walk around the area and if you would like see the unit, contact me for a showing.', 'The property is located at:', '6740 W. 84th Way, Unit 16', 'Arvada, CO 80003', 'Search Words:', 'Arvada', 'Lake Arbor Fairways', 'Townhome', 'Townhouse', 'Town Home', 'Town House', 'Condo']
